reviews.review_msg: In other classes, you don't learn much but get high marks.  In his class, you learn an awful lot but get on average a full letter grade lower than you do in other classes. He gets back at the Capitalist system by punishing his students with lower grades.  Be Warned

Lots of reading, I took this prof before, and everyone was complaining about readings, even my 4th year friend in our 1st year SA class with him! not fun! he is a nice person though! office hours may be limited.
